import React, { useContext } from 'react' import './ProductDisplay.css' import star_icon from '../Assets/star_icon.png' import star_dull_icon from '../Assets/star_dull_icon.png' import { ShopContext } from '../../Context/ShopContext' export const ProductDisplay = (props) => { const { product } = props; const { addToCart } = useContext(ShopContext); return (

{product.name}

(153)

${product.old_price}
${product.new_price}
The "Boys Orange Colourblocked Hooded Sweatshirt" is a stylish and comfortable clothing choice for boys. Its vibrant orange color and color-blocking design provide a trendy and eye-catching look.

Select Size

S
M
L

XXL

Category: Kid, T-shirt, Crop Top

Tags: Modern, Latest

) } export default ProductDisplay;
